author: kfogel
msg: Finish issue #1510: cvs2svn should handle RCS default branches.
(CollectData.set_revision_info): We don't need to worry about the
default branch's name here at all, so remove skeleton code.
(Commit.commit): Do the default_branch copies and deletes in trunk,

author: ringstrom
msg: Fix issue #1315: "make cvs2svn check the exit status of commands it runs"
Thanks to Robert Pluim for the initial patch.
(run_command): New function to run os.system with error checking.
run_command instead of calling os.system directly.
(Dumper.add_or_change_path): Check the return value when closing

author: cmpilato
msg: Add include/ and classes/ to the ignores list.
